title: Crypto Weekly Roundup: Solana Outage, EigenLayer Surge, & More
description: It has been an eventful week in crypto. A significant network outage took Solana offline for a few hours, and EigenLayer experienced a remarkable TVL surge after removing its staking limit. Let’s learn more.

title: CIPM President Forecasts Revolutionary HR Trends for 2024
description: In an unprecedented move, the Chartered Institute of Personnel Management of Nigeria (CIPM) has released its inaugural HR report, marking a significant milestone in the institute’s history. The report, unveiled by the CIPM President and Chairman of the Governing Council, Mr. Olusegun Mojeed, highlights the transformative role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Human Resources (HR) […]

title: Top Solana trader who bought 2022 dip at $10 and took profit in 2023, reinvests in new rival token currently at just $0.11
description: A prominent crypto trader known for buying Solana at just $10 in 2022 has now exited his position, taking substantial profits. The trader, shared that after selling off his Solana holdings which peaked at over $100 in 2022, he is reinvesting a significant portion into Retik Finance’s native token RETIK, currently priced at just $0.11 […]

title: Riyadh Set to Host Inaugural Global Smart City Forum
description: Saudi Arabia is preparing to host its first Global Smart City Forum, a significant event poised to transform urban development through smart technology. Scheduled to take place at the Riyadh Arena, the forum will span two days and operate under the banner “A Better Life”. It aims to bring together around 80 speakers from 40 […]

title: The Dawn of the AI Era: 2024 Marks a Pivotal Year for Generative AI Integration
description: As the world steps into 2024, dubbed the Year of the Dragon, the realm of artificial intelligence (AI) is witnessing an unprecedented leap forward. title: CoinMarketCap Research Examines an Innovative Blockchain Product Bridging Traditional and Decentralized Finance in Its New stUSDT Report
description: Dubai, UAE, February 9th, 2024, Chainwire CoinMarketCap Research, the research division of the world’s leading crypto data authority CoinMarketCap, has published an in-depth analysis on stUSDT – an innovative stablecoin that enables users to earn yield by staking their USDT.  The report closely examines how stUSDT bridges DeFi with traditional finance by giving users exposure [...]

title: Polygon’s price could soon fall as deep-pocket investors migrate to new competitor priced at just $0.11
description: In the world of cryptocurrencies, where market dynamics can shift in the blink of an eye, the rise of new contenders often signals a period of flux and reevaluation among investors. title: Hedera (HBAR), Stellar (XLM), and Cardano (ADA) Gear Up for Trillion-Dollar Market with ISO 20022 Compliance
description: Stellar, Cardano and Hedera are among the crypto tokens compliant with ISO 20022, positioning them as major players in a new era of cross-border fund transfers. ISO 20022 will replace SWIFT, the ubiquitous financial messaging protocol that industry players have depended on for five decades, and crypto is primed to play a significant role. After [...]

description:

title: ETH Clocks $2,534 as Geth Latest Update Sets Stage for Dencun Upgrade
description:
The biggest Ethereum execution layer client, Go Ethereum (Geth), has rolled out a crucial update in preparation for the highly anticipated Ethereum mainnet Dencun upgrade. Geth’s recent release, Geth v1.13.12, codenamed Edolus, plays a pivotal role in the Dencun upgrade journey. This release integrates the mainnet fork number for Cancun and addresses a Geth miner […]
